scripts.logs: aws logs get-log-events --log-group-name '/aws/lambda/awscodestar-cashly-bot-lambda-cashly-bot-webhook' --log-stream-name `aws logs describe-log-streams --log-group-name '/aws/lambda/awscodestar-cashly-bot-lambda-cashly-bot-webhook' --max-items 1 --order-by LastEventTime --descending --query logStreams[].logStreamName --output text | head -n 1` --query events[].message --output text
scripts.pipeline:status: aws codepipeline get-pipeline-state --name cashly-bot-Pipeline | jq '.stageStates[] | {name: .stageName, action: [.actionStates[].actionName], status: [.actionStates[].latestExecution.status]}'
